name: Pebble Paradise: Small Stones on a Seaside Shore
description: Explore the delicate beauty of a sea shore covered in small pebbles, where each stone contributes to the tranquil mosaic of the shoreline. This video captures the subtle details of the pebbles, their varied colors and textures, gently washed by the lapping waves. The soft play of light and shadow over the pebbled shore creates a serene and calming visual experience. Ideal for content highlighting the natural beauty of coastal environments, the intricate details of pebble-strewn beaches, or the soothing rhythms of the sea.
